playn.core

Class AssetWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • playn.core.AssetWatcher

  • public class AssetWatcher
extends Object
    A utility class that helps keep track of image loading.

    To use: create a new AssetWatcher, then add images using add(Image) and finally call start().

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AssetWatcher.Listener
      A listener that is notified of asset loading progress and failures.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AssetWatcher()
      Creates a new watcher without a listener.
      AssetWatcher(AssetWatcher.Listener listener)
      Creates a new watcher with the given listener.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Image image)
      Adds an image resource to be watched.
      void add(Sound sound)
      Adds a sound resource to be watched.
      boolean isDone()
      Whether all resources have completed loading, either successfully or in error.
      void start()
      Done adding resources; AssetWatcher.Listener.done() will be called as soon as all assets are done being loaded.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AssetWatcher

        public AssetWatcher()
        Creates a new watcher without a listener.

      • AssetWatcher

        public AssetWatcher(AssetWatcher.Listener listener)
        Creates a new watcher with the given listener.

        Note: must call start() after adding your resources.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(Image image)
        Adds an image resource to be watched.

      • add

        public void add(Sound sound)
        Adds a sound resource to be watched.

      • isDone

        public boolean isDone()
        Whether all resources have completed loading, either successfully or in error.

      • start

        public void start()
        Done adding resources; AssetWatcher.Listener.done() will be called as soon as all assets are done being loaded. There is no need to call this method if there is no listener. isDone() will return true as soon as all pending assets are loaded.
